column5: Hey all, I need some help.  I am going to be re-painting my Aluminum Boat. That means off with the old Lund Decals and time to source out some new ones. And some fresh Paint to make it look snazzy.  Now I am not sure about that part. Does anyone know of any graphics guys that can or if there is a place that carries the decals? Its a Lund WC-14. I am going to snoop around the Lund site to see if I can find anything out.  Any direction would be great.  Thanks in advance guys (and ladies)
See your local SignMaker/Painter . They can do anything these days.
you might wanna try ebay...there are some pretty good decals for a reasonable price......being sold and not as a bid item   just a though
Yup what Danbo says .  I am in the business I sell supplies to the sign makers they can do it quickly it would probably take weeks to get those decals from lund.
Yup what Danbo says .  I am in the business I sell supplies to the sign makers they can do it quickly it would probably take weeks to get those decals from lund.
Hey Mike - I was gonna say you can say that again - but I see you did ( double post )  -  LOL  Don
Do a before paint job, then after paint job pic.  Call Lund and they may send for free.  It is free advertising for them.  forrest

Lund decals will cost about $200.  That's what they are for my Mr. Pike.  If the ones you have aren't too fancy, it might be cheaper to get them from a sign shop,  but even some of those guys gouge pretty bad on vinyl cutting.
i got mine from the local lund dealer for my pro-v
I know there is a guy on here, I remember seeing his post when the Tourny was just starting. I cant remember what team or what his screen name was. Hopefully he will read this.
$200!!???  I almost choked on my dinner.  If its a big decal package with pinstripes I can see that....but what about those smaller 8 by 14 "Lund" stickers?  forrest

Just Lund logo, with long underline...  The fancy graphic stripes were a second decal kit that ran about the same price.  Seems the Lund logo is patented and the graphics are copyrighted.  So they charge big bucks.

I take it that you are saying that someone else holds the copyright to the logo...strange.  If its a Lund logo......they are gouging.  Buy L U N D in a nice but plain font and put near transom on each side.  go to trade show or call up other companies for free logo....mercury, yamaha, OFC, Starcraft  and Pay a pin-striper for a custom graphic.  forrest
Yep gouging.  They hold the copyright themselves.  Or I should say Brunswick does.
How about some cans of Tremclad & some Masking Tape & try your own design or copy some others?
I second ebay, lots of lund decals.  Daniel OCH
